item.title: A lamp post without the lamp portion, 31st December
item.description:
At least a year ago a lamp post was installed and we have yet to see the lamp portion fitted. This job involved digging up the road, running cabling and installing the post. However nobody ever arrived to install the light so it is useless until someone puts the light on it. Can someone put the light(possibly camera) on the top so this isn't a monument to financial waste anymore

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Leathermarket Street, The Borough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Human feces in oakhurst, 31st December
item.description:

item.title: Missing pavement slabs, 31st December
item.description:
Every time pavement is removed for below ground works, they seem to be throwing the pavement slabs away and later fill the hole with asphalt. Is no one signing these works off? This nonsensical practice of throwing the stones away must stop now. Whoever worked on this must pay the replacement out of their own pocket.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Greenwich High Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rolleston Avenue, Crofton, Greater London

item.title: Domestic Waste O/S 243 Beckenham Road, 31st December
item.description:
Tenants from 243-249 Beckenham Road continue to leave their rubbish on the pavement. This has been an ongoing-going issue for many months. Owner / Landlord of property do not manage the property or tenants

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mackenzie Road, Penge, Greater London
